query: 如图,⊙O是△ABC的外接圆,已知AD平分∠BAC交⊙O于点D,AD=5,BD=2,则AE的长为()选项：['\\frac{4}{25}', '\\frac{4}{5}', '\\frac{32}{25}', '\\frac{21}{5}']
answer: 解:∵AD平分∠BAC,∴∠BAD=∠DAC,∵∠DBC=∠DAC(同弧所对的圆周角相等),∴∠DBC=∠BAD,∴△ABD∽△BED,∴\frac{AD}{BD}=\frac{BD}{DE},∴DE=\frac{BD²}{AD}=\frac{4}{5},∴AE=AD-DE=5-\frac{4}{5}=\frac{21}{5}．故选:D．
